original_text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein, and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief:
korean_text: 그러면 거기에 들어갈 자들이 남아 있거니와 복음 전함을 먼저 받은 자들은 순종하지 아니함으로 말미암아 들어가지 못하였으므로

sentences.original_text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 어떤 사람들은 반드시 그곳에 들어가야 하는 것이 남아있음을 보니

sentences.original_text: and they to whom it was first preached
entered not in because of unbelief:
